content: With the passing of the legislation in its current format along with our planned pilot in the port of Los Angeles, our hope and belief is that it will lead to similar legislations and actual project implementations in other states within the U.S. Our approach is well aligned with global initiatives including legislation and renewable energy mandates such as the recent $369 billion Renewable Energy Bill Initiative by the U.S. Government, the Inflation Reduction Act of 2022 have been discussed in the positive shift that we believe we're able to bring to the energy ecosystem at recent event in the United States, including the UN Ocean Conference, the New York Climate Week, the QUAD Conference in Los Angeles, and the Atlantic's Next Scientific Revolution Conference, while simultaneously meeting with forward thinking legislators seeking to integrate Wave Energy in their state's respective renewable energy policies.
